attributes.action: Ask the Queen to Dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Events in both recent and mid-term history has caused many in the public to now lack confidence in the current parliament and parliamentary system.

As the authority of parliament, the bad, ill-considered laws that have been created under the current government and the obvious crookedness of the current political class, continuing as is futile and ultimately extremely damaging to the country and its people. 

Respect for authority and law is fast disappearing and without the opportunity for the people to take action, this situation can only get worse.

Gordon, I therefore ask you to go to the Queen to request that she orders parliament be resolved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
